ygData.subject: Re: --==SPOILER==-- Well Wizards might get powerful but at lev 14 the y are still weak
ygData.msgSnippet: --==SPOILER==-- Well Wizards might get powerful but at lev 14 they are still weakAs a 20th lvl wizard, I can tell you that no one can match our raw power, not
ygData.messageBody:
--==SPOILER==-- Well Wizards might get powerful but at lev 14 they are still weakAs a 20th lvl wizard, I can tell you that no one can match our raw power, not even clerics with their undead spell. At 20th lvl, I'm doing 171 dmg that also has a chance to stun the creature. The clerics don't get their next Undead DD spell until 24th, so they are only doing 90+ dmg at 20th. At 24th they will be doing close to 200, but the wizard's DD spell with be doing at least that much.

*Major Spoiler* At 49thh lvl, the wizards get a DD spell that does 1100 dmg!!!! No other class can come close to that amount of dmg ;) Gives ya something to look forward to ;)

Talarin High Elven Wizard
----- Original Message -----
From: patrick.waal@...
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Sent: Sunday, April 18, 1999 3:01 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] --==SPOILER==-- Well Wizards might get powerful but at lev 14 the y are still weak


Hail Fellow Wizards

My name is Oonagh i play on the E'ci server

I am a devouted Wizard.. Don't get me wrong , but as a reply to Greg (Kronan)
I would say:

All caster class can do as much damage as a wizard until lev 15 at least (I am only 14 )

Magicians does in the mid 70 dam with their spell DirectDam spell
Clerics do the same
Necros i don't know about, but think they do about mid 70 as well
Wizards does 80dam per DD spell
At 16 you do about 100 dam as your DD spell

So you would not see your class shine until higher lev..

Perhaps 20.. I don't know but i heard the DD Wizard spell did 200dam there.. offcourse the Cleric undead spell at that lev does close to 200 dam as well.. But thats just against undeads.

I am 14th lev now and all the other casters i meet do just as much damage as me and have much more nicer utility spell like pets. buffs/debuffs etc..

I am in need of another player to really get xp (or actually any xp at all without the danger of dying or zoning to save my butt on every mob i attack).. wheras the magics and necros etc can solo perfectly alone..

I am sure the reward will be GREAT, BUT it will come at a later level than 14, believe me.
maybe 20 maybe higher.

Hang in there fellow Wizard, we WILL rule the world *snicker*

Oonagh the Gnome Wizard
